column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=My husband was riding down a steep hill a few miles from home when he got a blow out .
#text=He called me to come and get him .
#text=He had the bicycle repair kit on him .
#text=We took the tire off with some tools .
#text=He checked the inner tube for holes by putting air in it .
#text=He found the hole and marked it .
#text=That is the place where he put the patch and glued it .
#text=My husband put the tube back in the bicycle .
#text=The frame was a little bent but the bike was okay .
#text=I followed him for a little while .
#text=He was almost to the park so I met him there .
#text=After a while we put the bike in the back of the truck and drove home .
